channel.title: Karina Karimova on Allwellbeing
channel.description: Recent content in Karina Karimova on Allwellbeing

item.title: The United States began a technological blockade of China. Where it leads
item.description: Competition between the world’s two largest economies, the United States and China, is intensifying on the technology front. Before the landmark 20th Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Joe Biden administration announced serious new restrictions on the sale of semiconductor technologies to China. The new measures from the US Department of Commerce are largely aimed at slowing down the development of Chinese military programs. In their technology, they use supercomputers to simulate nuclear explosions, control hypersonic weapons and create advanced networks to monitor political dissenters and minorities, writes The New York Times.
